ui.description: Use Shadcn UI components for consistent and accessible UI elements

validation.description: Use Zod for schema validation and type safety

forms.description: Use React Hook Form for form handling and validation

state.description: Use Zustand for global state management

data-fetching.description: Use React Query for server state management and data fetching

package-manager.description: Use PNPM for faster and more efficient dependency management

framework.description: Use Next.js with App Router for modern React applications

styling.description: Use Tailwind CSS for utility-first styling approach (required by shadcn/ui)

typescript.description: Use TypeScript for type safety and better developer experience

server-components.description: Leverage React Server Components for improved performance and SEO

code-quality.description: Use ESLint and Prettier for code quality and formatting

testing.description: Use Vitest and React Testing Library for component and unit testing
